mapper.select: SELECT co.*,e.employee_name,cu.customer_name,p.proj_name,p.proj_line,p.proj_substate,cs.contract_stage,cs.contract_proportion, cs.contract_amount,cs.contract_time,cs.contract_remark FROM contract as co left join contract_step as cs on co.id=cs.fk_contract_id left join customer as cu on co.fk_customer_id=cu.id left join customer_salesman as csman on csman.fk_customer_id=co.fk_customer_id left join project as p on p.id=co.fk_project_id left join employee as e on e.employee_gh=co.fk_employee_gh where (cs.acceptance_done!=1 or cs.payment_done!=1) and csman.employee_gh=#{employeeGh} group by co.id having min(cs.contract_time)

SELECT co.*,e.employee_name,cu.customer_name,p.proj_name,p.proj_line,p.proj_substate,cs.contract_stage,cs.contract_proportion, cs.contract_amount,cs.contract_time,cs.contract_remark FROM contract as co left join contract_step as cs on co.id=cs.fk_contract_id left join customer as cu on co.fk_customer_id=cu.id left join project as p on p.id=co.fk_project_id left join employee as e on e.employee_gh=co.fk_employee_gh where (cs.acceptance_done!=1 or cs.payment_done!=1) group by co.id having min(cs.contract_time)

SELECT co.*,e.employee_name,cu.customer_name,p.proj_name,p.proj_line,p.proj_substate,cs.contract_stage,cs.contract_proportion, cs.contract_amount,cs.contract_time,cs.contract_remark FROM contract as co left join contract_step as cs on co.id=cs.fk_contract_id left join customer as cu on co.fk_customer_id=cu.id left join customer_dic_data as cdd2 on cdd2.id=cu.customer_industry left join project as p on p.id=co.fk_project_id left join employee as e on e.employee_gh=co.fk_employee_gh where (cs.acceptance_done!=1 or cs.payment_done!=1) and cdd2.dic_data_sort=#{sales} group by co.id having min(cs.contract_time)
SELECT id,fk_contract_id,sum(contract_amount) as contract_received FROM contract_step where acceptance_done=1 and payment_done=1 group by fk_contract_id;
SELECT cs.*,e.employee_name FROM contract_step as cs left join employee as e on e.employee_gh=cs.fk_employee_gh left join contract as co on co.id=cs.fk_contract_id where co.fk_project_id=#{projId};
mapper.insert:
insert into contract(fk_customer_id, fk_project_id, contract_no, contract_name, contract_money, contract_date, fk_employee_gh) values(fkCustomerId, fkProjectId, contractNo, contractName, contractMoney, contractDate, fkEmployeeGh)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id

insert into contract_step(fk_contract_id, contract_stage, contract_proportion, contract_amount, contract_standard, fk_employee_gh, contract_time, contract_remark) values
(#{contractStep.fkContractId},#{contractStep.contractStage},#{contractStep.contractProportion},#{contractStep.contractAmount}, #{contractStep.contractStandard},#{contractStep.fkEmployeeGh},#{contractStep.contractTime},#{contractStep.contractRemark})
